additionalDescription: 'We provide metadata information of each audio file regarding the location, type of recorder and recording parameters employed during recording'
captureDevice: Mostly AudioMoths, hand recorders, and Song Meters
description: This data paper presents WABAD, the World Annotated Bird Acoustic Dataset for passive acoustic monitoring. WABAD is designed to provide the public, research community, and managers with a novel and globally representative annotated acoustic dataset.
name: WABAD
title: WABAD: A World Annotated Bird Acoustic Dataset for Passive Acoustic Monitoring
